questions.question: Ich _______ die Übung. (I am working on the exercise)
questions.notes: Used 'arbeiten auf' instead of 'bearbeiten'. Common confusion - 'bearbeiten' is one word meaning 'to work on/process'

questions.question: Was ist die _______? (What is the research question?)
Wir müssen die Begriffe _______. (We must distinguish the concepts)
questions.notes: Wrote 'dir' (to you) instead of 'die' (the). Small typo, understands the verb 'unterscheiden'

questions.question: German parliament passes new renewable energy law
Two parties negotiate coalition after election
Germany has federal system with 16 Bundesländer
Classify Book 1 (Blum & Schubert) and Book 2 (Schubert & Bandelow Hrsg.)
questions.notes: Correctly identified based on 'Hrsg.' marker. Good understanding!

session_notes: Excellent first session! Strong grasp of Policy/Polity/Politics concepts (100%). Good vocabulary retention (80%). Monograph/Sammelband distinction mastered (100%). Main areas for improvement: German grammar (articles 'die' vs 'dir', compound verbs 'bearbeiten').
chat_context_summary: First learning session combining German language learning with Übung A preparation. Student wants to improve German through sociology materials. Focus on vocabulary, concepts, and Übung completion. Interactive quiz-based learning approach.
